morningPages: What's on your mind at the moment? Where are your thoughts travelling towards?
How do you feel about the day ahead? Is there anything you're looking forward to?
What's inspiring you at the moment?
futureSelf: What behavior or pattern are you practicing (to change) today?
What are the daily affirmations or statements that will help you achieve this?
What are you grateful for that supports you on this journey?
The person I am becoming will experience more:
I have an opportunity to be my future self today when I:
morningProductivity: What's one thing that you absolutely must do today?
What are three smaller things that you should do that will make your life easier?
What's one action you can take today that'll push you closer to your personal goal?
Any barriers you face and their solutions if you can find some. How can you increase your chances of reaching your goals?
gratitude: What are you grateful for today?
manifestation: What do you want your life to be like?
Why is this meaningful to you?
How will you realize your vision? By when?
